altTitles.ja: ダンジョンリセット

description.de:
Dawoons normales Leben wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als er in den Dungeon gerufen wird, wo er ein tödliches Spiel gegen gefährliche Monster und lebensbedrohliche Fallen spielen muss. Was die Sache schlimmer macht, ist, er ist nur ein einfacher Handwerker mit null Kampffähigkeiten. Aber nachdem Dawoon in eine Falle gerät und einen fehlerhaften Reset überlebt, hat er willkürliche und dennoch sehr hilfreiche Fähigkeiten. Zusammen mit einem blutrünstigen Gefährten und einem niedlichen Eichhörnchen muss er sich etwas einfallen lassen, um das Spiel zu gewinnen und nach Hause zurückzukehren. Welche Abenteuer erwarten ihn in den Tunneln – jetzt, wo die Regeln für ihn scheinbar nicht mehr gültig sind?

---
- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/dungeon-reset-de)
description.en: Dawoon's ordinary life is turned upside down when he is summoned into the Dungeon, where he must play a deadly game, outlasting dangerous monsters and life-threatening traps. To make matters worse, he's only a mere crafter with zero combat abilities. But after Dawoon falls into a trap and survives after a glitched reset, he's gained random but oddly helpful skills. He'll need to get creative to clear the game and return home, with a bloodthirsty assistant and an adorable ground squirrel along for the ride. Now that the rules no longer apply to him, what possibilities await in the tunnels below.
description.fa: ⁧⁧   وقتی که بازنشانی شروع بشه، همه چیز به حالت قبلش برای شرکت کننده های بعدی برمیگرده، چرا بازنشانی روی من کار نمیکنه؟! با یک مهارت ساده بازی برای جئونگ داوون درون دانجن شروع میشه .
description.fr:
La vie ordinaire de Dawoon bascule le jour où il se retrouve invoqué dans un monde parallère, dans lequel il va devoir jouer à un jeu mortel intitulé Dungeon Game. Il se retrouve ainsi obligé à faire face à de dangereuses créatures, ainsi qu'à de nombreux pièges mettant constamment sa vie en péril. Et comme si cette situation ne suffisait pas, il s'avère également que l'abilité dont il a été doté est totalement inutile en combat. Néanmoins, après être tombé dans un piège et avoir mystérieusement survécu, un étrange bug va lui donner de nouvelles compétences aléatoires, mais étrangement utiles. Il va devoir redoubler d'astuce pour finir le jeu et pouvoir enfin rentrer chez lui, tout en ayant à ses côtés un Assistant de jeu assoiffé de sang, et un adorable petit écureuil. Maintenant qu'il n'a plus aucune règle à suivre avec assiduité, que va-t-il se passer pour lui dans cet étrange univers ?

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/dungeon-reset-fr)
description.ja:
｢このダンジョンはリセットされます｣ 一度プレイしたダンジョンや罠は次の｢ユーザー｣のためにリセットされる。 しかしその｢リセット｣が俺には適応されない！？ 絶えずリセットされるダンジョンで唯一自由の身となった「奏多」。 その場しのぎで武装した｢バグ｣人間 定岡奏多のダンジョン開拓期が始まるーー！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/40532)
description.ko:
[던전이 리셋됩니다.]

한번 플레이한 던전이나 함정은 다음 '유저'들을 위해 '리셋'이라는 과정을 거친다.
그 '리셋'이, '나'에게는 적용되지 않는다?!


끊임없이 리셋되는 던전에서 유일하게 자유로워진 존재.
압도적인 노가다로 무장한 '버그 종자' 정다운의 던전 개척기가 시작된다!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%98%EC%A0%84-%EB%A6%AC%EC%85%8B/2373)
description.ru: [Идет перезагрузка Подземелья.] Подземелье или ловушки, в которых была игра, проходят стадию перезагрузки для следующих пользователей.Может, эта «перезагрузка» применима и ко мне?! Единственное существо, которое свободно от постоянно перезапускаемой Пещеры. Вооружившись грандиозной силой, Чон Да Ун начинает освоение Подземелья!
description.th:
[ดันเจี้ยนกำลังรีเซ็ต]  
เมื่อมีการเดินสำรวจดันเจี้ยนเกิดขึ้น, กับดักทุกอย่างเริ่มทำงาน, มันก็จะเริ่มทำการรีเซ็ตตัวเองเพื่อสำหรับ "ผู้เล่น" คนต่อไป  
แต่ทว่าการรีเซ็ตเหล่านั้นดันใช้ไม่ได้กับฉัน! ฉันจะต้องอยู่อย่างไร้จุดหมายในดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้อย่างไร้กำหนด, ฉัน, จัง ดาอุน  
"เจ้าข้อผิดพลาด" ได้ได้เวลาเริ่มออกสำรวจดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้แล้ว!
description.zh-hk:
［副本即將重置。］

為提供下一批「玩家」體驗，
已通過的副本、已觸發的陷阱
都會經過名為重置的過程。
然而，那所謂的「重置」居然對「我」不管用?!

在不斷重置的副本裡，身為唯一的自由之身，
只能把苦力活做好做滿，「農起來」武裝自己，
「Bug仔」鄭多運的副本開墾記就此展開!

---

description.en: Marie, a sparkling university student who craves validation, takes up a part-time job at a concept cafe for their uniforms. There, she meets Akira, a spontaneous and unpredictable person. Their meeting sets off a chain of events that changes Marie's life, and they end up spending time together as…accomplices!? An overdose of desire begins in the neon-glowing sleepless city!!
description.ja: 承認欲求あふれるキラキラ大学生インフルエンサーのマリーは制服目当てでダイナーのコンセプトカフェでバイトをすることに。そこで地雷系キッズのアキと出会ったことで、人生を一変する大事件を起こし、共犯者としてともに過ごすこととなり…!?　ネオン輝く眠らない街で欲望のオーバードーズが始まる!!

altTitles.ja: お忍び同棲

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

altTitles.ja: ネズミのヒコーキ

description.en:
More ratventures from Tamura.

---
Published in Bikkuri House November 1979.

In a world where prehispanic cultures developed an steam powered industrial technology, a young redheaded girl — the huntress Metzli — is tracking an interesting bounty. Maybe this commission is bigger than she expects. 

"It's like The Witcher but in Mexico" - a random guy, probably
description.es-la:
Sigue las aventuras de Metzli, una cazadora de monstruos tratando de ganar el pan del día a día para ella y sus hermanos. 

“Es como si the Witcher ocurriera en Mexico” – Un weon, probablemente

description.en: Kina, a witch doctor living on Mount Walpurgis, hears a prophecy from a titmouse one day that she will be executed within six months and will meet three men who will share her fate. Determined to escape her destiny, she hides in the mountains, but soon finds herself swept away by one man and sent to the imperial palace, where court intrigue awaits her. Can she survive the palace's plots and escape her foretold fate?

title.en: I Raised My Younger Sister Beautifully

altTitles.en: I Raised My Little Sis Beautifully

altTitles.th: คราวนี้ฉันจะเลี้ยงน้องเป็นอย่างดี

altTitles.ja: 妹を可愛く育てたら大公 様に溺愛されました

description.en:
When Princess Fleta, who has been mistreated her entire life due to being born with a curse, summons the basilisk and destroys the palace, Princess Cezanne regrets that things could have turned out differently if someone had been by Fleta's side. So when she miraculously finds herself six years back in time, she is determined to take Fleta under her wing and fill her baby sister's life with nothing but joyful light. Will Cezanne be able to dispel the darkness inside Fleta and rewrite the ending?

---
The imperial family collapsed during one night by the basilisk, the summoned beast of darkness which was summoned by the cursed princess, Fleta. “If there is a next life, then… Can I really be your younger sister?” If I had approached you a little earlier, would it have been different from now? The last time everyone regretted it, the time miraculously returned to 6 years earlier. If this is the second chance we've been given.
description.ru: Императорская семья рухнула за одну ночь из-за василиска, призванного зверя тьмы, которого призвала проклятая принцесса Флета. «Если есть следующая жизнь, то… Могу ли я действительно быть твоей младшей сестрой?» Если бы я обратился к тебе немного раньше, было бы всё иначе, чем сейчас? Последний раз все об этом пожалели, время чудесным образом вернулось на 6 лет назад. Если это второй шанс, который нам дан...

altTitles.en: Payback to those that bullied me. This is the revenge of 31.

altTitles.ja: イジメカエシ。－復讐の３１-

description.en:
I was bullied by everyone, so in return I'm going to slaughter them all.  
Taking inspiration from the 31 days of the calendar, the uber popular girl group Calendrier was formed. Behind the bubbly appearance, in the shadows, there is one member that is bullied by the others on a daily basis. "If you can't smile, then neither will the fans."  
She is willing to do anything to regain the smile that was robbed by her group mates.  
  
With 30 members as her opponents, this is the story of the crazy number 31.

altTitles.zh-ro: Lian'ai Rang Wo Youle Chao Nengli

altTitles.en: Falling In Love Gives Me Superpowers

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

Workaholic Lee Dain, the dazzling actress and national goddess, never saw herself walking down the aisle. But when her grandfather falls ill, she grants his final wish by marrying her failed one-night-stand, Seo Dojun. Suddenly, her life spins into chaos: handling wacky in-laws, dodging a junior actor's advances, and dealing with her hubby's ex. Armed with her trademark confidence and sass, she's ready to take it all on. But will this rollercoaster marriage ever find its happily ever after?

altTitles.en: I Am a Daughter Loved by the Devil
I Am the Beloved Daughter of the Devil

altTitles.pt-br: Sou a amada filha do diabo

description.en:
I'm Mia, a child abused by my family. One day I had a 'dream' and saw the future. A future where I fell for my aunt and uncle's schemes, accidentally murdered my older half-brother, and causing a great war. Things just can't end like this, so I'll change the future with my own hands! 

With the information gathered from the dream, the first thing I have to do is find my biological father!

"Gimme thild thupport!"

(If only I didn't lisp!) In return for selling information about my uncle's schemes and taking all the backlog of child support from my biological father, I was planning on leaving…

But then my eldest brother, who boasts an aloof beauty, said, "I'm thinking of building you an amusement park."

My reckless second eldest brother interrupted and said, "Shall I buy you a tropical island covered with pretty flowers?"

And the most handsome man in the world, my Papa, replied on a whole nother level! "I'll buy you an artifact which calls for mermaids."

No, no, no! All three have terrible liquidity! The cleverest, smartest, most materialistic, devilish answer is… "Please make me a slide made of pure gold!"

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)
description.ko:
"양유삐 주세요!(양육비 주세요!)"

외숙부와 이모에게 학대를 받으며 살던 미아. 어느 날, 그녀는 꿈 속에서 자신이 외숙부의 계략에 넘어가 친오빠를 살해하고, 세계 멸망을 일으키는 미래를 보게 된다.

이렇게 죽을 수는 없지! 미래는 내 손으로 바꾼다!

미아는 친부에게 외숙부의 흉계를 팔아 넘기고, 밀린 양육비에 정보 비용을 얹어서 청구하기로 결심하는데...

나는 제법 심각한 표정을 지으며 입을 열었다. 양손도 자랑스레 펼쳐 보인 채였다.

"샤다 샤. 그삐 정보에 단됸 천 골드! (싸다 싸. 극비 정보에 단돈 천 골드!)"

저기, 세계 멸망을 막을 정보 사실래요?

_

"꽃이 예쁘게 피는 열대 섬 하나 사줄까?"
아벨이 이렇게 말하자마자,

"섬에 아무것도 없으면 심심할테니 큰 오빠가 놀이동산을 하나 지어줄까 해."
카이옌 오빠가 끼어들고,

"나는 인어를 부르는 아티팩트를 사주마. 그게 있으면 밤새 인어의 노래를 들으며 놀 수 있을 거다."
아빠는 한 술 더 뜬다!

나는 영리하고 똑똑한 속물 악마답게 공손히 입을 열었다.

"미끄럼틀은 순금으로 만들어 주세요."

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)
description.pt-br:
Mia cresceu sendo abusada por seu tio e tia. Um dia, em um sonho, ela vê um futuro que cai no esquema de seu tio e tia maternos, mata seu meio-irmão e causa uma grande guerra. Não pode acabar assim, o futuro está em minhas mãos! O primeiro passo nesse esforço é encontrar o pai que você conheceu em seu sonho!

“Dê-me uma carona!”

Em troca de vender as artimanhas do meu tio materno para o meu pai biológico, eu planejava sair com a pensão alimentícia e os custos de informação...
“Estou pensando em construir um parque de diversões.”

Quando o irmão mais velho, que se orgulha de nobre beleza, disse: “Você gostaria de me comprar uma ilha tropical com lindas flores?”

Meu segundo irmão não vai intervir, "Eu vou te comprar um artefato que chama uma sereia."

O pai mais bonito do mundo tem mais uma bebida! não! Todos os três são extremamente ruins para o dinheiro!!! A resposta diabólica do esnobe esperto e esperto é... “Faça o slide de ouro puro!”

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)

title.en: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers

altTitles.ko: 누가 우리 오빠들 좀 말려 주세요

description.en:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game as an NPC

altTitles.ko: 망겜 속에 갇혔다 근데 이제 NPC를 곁들인

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game, but Now With NPCs
Trapped in a Game That Flopped

description.en:
I'm going to live a normal life!

...said Shari Azriel, the apothecary of the Dover village.

Then one day, I realised that I possessed an NPC in a video game! I've been locked up here for two years, and I only just noticed.

If I can't get out of the game...
"A, in their 20's, was found starved to death while playing VR games."
This could be what I'm remembered as!

"I have to get out!"

However, it was too late when I came to the realisation that... I can't log out because of an error!

That means, the only way out would be approaching the male lead, "the Lord of Nightmares," and helping his comrades defeat the final villain. So I have no choice but to wait until the game ends...

The difficulty level, the story, the likelihood of failure in such a heinous game, a game that nobody won before...

"The Lord of Nightmares has a strong urge to kill you."

Somehow, I believe that dying by the male lead's hands would be faster.

altTitles.ja: ワンピース エピソード A
ワンピース エピソード エース
ロロノア・ゾロ海に散る

altTitles.uk: Ван Піс: Ророноа Зоро за бортом

altTitles.ja: ナミvsカリファ

altTitles.en: Roronoa Zoro Falls Into the Sea

description.en:
Washed up on the shores of a deserted island at the edge of the East Blue Sea, two men from different backgrounds unite in their shared thirst for adventure. One of them, Portgaz D. Ace, will follow in his infamous father’s footsteps as the fearless captain of a pirate crew. The other, Masked Deuce, becomes the reluctant first member of Ace’s Spade Pirates. Survival is not enough for these seafaring buccaneers, as together they seek treasure, excitement, and a route to the New World.

---
**Note**: Includes two oneshots part of the **One Piece Cover Comic Project** in which other manga authors recreate Eiichiro Oda's original One Piece chapters in their own style.

[One more oneshot](https://mangadex.org/title/7bd37661-c0b1-4166-87c1-7e633adb55ac) was drawn for this project by Komi Naoshi.
description.pt-br: A história do irmão do Luffy e filho do Rei dos Piratas, Portgas D. Ace, e foca no período logo após ele ter saído em sua aventura como pirata, antes de seu encontro com o Barba Branca.

altTitles.ja: コローリ コローレ クレアーレ
ココクレ

description.en: The town of Onobori is located on an island and is protected by a noren (a traditional Japanese curtain). Aka is a naive girl living alone with her grandfather who runs a coffee shop in a quaint windmill hut. An encounter with a giant black cat opens the curtain on a story of creating the colors of the future by weaving together the colorful splendor that is scattered throughout daily life!

altTitles.zh-ro: You Bei Houbei Xia Ke Shang
Yòu Bèi Hòubèi Xià Kè Shàng

altTitles.en: I've Been Defeated by The Younger Generation Again
I Was Beaten Down By The Younger Generation Again

description.en: Referred to as “The Cobra” by her employees, art director Lu Meihe appears to most as a strict and callous boss but she is actually rather innocent at heart. She has a secret crush on her intern Lin Wenjing, but because of her public image, she cannot express her feelings openly and instead pours them into the sketchbook she always carries with her. One day, she accidentally leaves the sketchbook behind only for it to be discovered by Lin Wenjing. Lu Meihe soon realizes that while Lin Wenjing may seem gentle and carefree, she may actually be hiding a secret persona of her own. Today my intern bullied me again, I’m so happy I don’t know what to do!
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

altTitles.ja: タイカの理性

altTitles.en: The Whys and Wherefores of Taika

description.en:
As birth rates decline, in an effort to increase the total population of Japan, the country has implemented... a pet-humanism policy...?
As more and more owners "humanize" their pets--having them become members of society--Japan begins to experience a hike in economic growth, as well as in increase in crimes committed by these "dogmen" and "catmen"...
In the midst of such social unrest, what could possibly be of bigger concern to one cynical high school girl named Ao...?

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

altTitles.ja: やばいアイドルのマネージャーになっちゃった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Yabai Aidoru no Manager ni Nacchatta Hanashi

description.en:
Reluctantly becoming a manager, I was assigned to my first role managing the super popular idol, "Maron," who has a hidden side...

On stage, Maron shines brightly, but in her private life, she's a caring but strange girl who can't give up smoking and requires a lot of attention. As her manager, I have to support her and keep the true face of this "perfect idol" hidden!

An idol with secrets × A caring manager 

Their story begins in the smoking area...
description.ja:
仕方なくマネージャーになって、
初めて担当する大人気アイドル「まろん」には
裏の顔があった...。

舞台上でキラキラしているまろんだが、
私生活ではタバコが手放せない、世話の焼ける変わった女の子。
「完璧なアイドル」まろんの素顔を隠し通すために、
マネージャーとしてサポートしなければ！

裏ありアイドル×世話好きマネージャー
喫煙所から始まる、二人の物語ーー。

altTitles.ja: 幻覚少女がつきまとう話

altTitles.en: A Story About A Hallucinatory Girl Following Me Around

altTitles.vi: Cô gái trong ảo giác của tôi

altTitles.ja: 幻覚少女がつきまとう ハミタの読み切り

altTitles.ja-ro: Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou - Hamita no Yomikiri

altTitles.en: A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around - Hamita Oneshots

altTitles.cs: Příběh o halucinózní holce co se za mnou slídí

description.en:
A story about being followed around by a girl who appears to be just a hallucination.

---

Note: The original web comic that was released on on Twitter and Pixiv has been compiled on Amazon into 1 ebook volume titled Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou (幻覚少女がつきまとう) "A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around" and released on March 25, 2024.

* Alternate Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/116706658)

altTitles.ja: じゅうざい

description.en:
When ten criminal acts collide, what's going to happen!?  
  
From the creator of Danshi Koukousei no Nichijou.

Is the terrible heartache caused by a distant lover? Or is it the ties and obsession that follow along, like love that won't come true...?
*From the same author of Missing Love: The Marrying Man

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.th: ยุคแห่งความโอหัง

altTitles.ja: 傲慢の時代

description.ar: سيد بيرباز، الذي قاد الحرب التي استمرت 28 عامًا إلى النصر، "آشا بيرباز". بالنسبة لبيرفاز، الذي دمرته الحرب الطويلة، تتوجه آشا إلى العائلة الإمبراطورية لتلقي مكافأة النصر التي وعد بها الإمبراطور. ومع ذلك، فإن المكافأة الوحيدة التي عادت كانت <الحق في اختيار شريك الزواج>. كخيار أفضل، أشار آشا إلى "دوق كارلايل هافن"، وهو الأمير الأول الذي تم حرمانه مؤخرًا من لقب ولي العهد. إذا تم رفضها، كانت تنوي الحصول على نفقة من الإمبراطور... "ماركيز بيرباز. سأقبل عرض زواجك". وعلى عكس التوقعات، قبل دوق كارلايل اختيار آشا. وعود بدعم هائل لبيرفاز...!
description.en:
The lord of Pervaz, who led the 28-year war to victory, Asha Pervaz. 

For Pervaz, who was devastated by the long war, Asha heads to the imperial family to receive the victory reward promised by the emperor.  However, the only reward that came back was the "right to choose a marriage partner." 

As the best choice, Asha pointed out the Duke of Carlisle Haven, the first prince who had recently been deprived of the title of crown prince.  If she was refused, she intended to receive compensation from the emperor... 

"Marquise Perbaz. I will accept your marriage proposal." 

Contrary to expectations, the Duke of Carlisle accepted Asha's choice.  Promising tremendous support for Pervaz...!

---
After winning a long war, Asha Pervaz is expecting the emperor to compensate her with money. Unlike her expectations though, the emperor asks Asha to choose her own husband from a list of nobles. Asha chooses Duke Carlisle Haven, the emperor’s eldest son and former crown prince. Asha expects him to object and pay an alimony instead, but the duke actually agrees to marry her! He even promises to help Asha rebuild Pervaz. What does the duke really want? And will Asha get what she wants without getting embroiled in the growing royal conspiracy?
description.fr: Après avoir mis fin à la longue guerre contre les Lurs, Asha Pervaz, Seigneure des terres de Pervaz, se rend au palais impérial dans l'espoir d'obtenir la récompense promise par l'Empereur. Mais contrairement à ses attentes, Asha ne se voit offrir que le droit de choisir un époux. Fine stratège, elle choisit le Duc Carlisle Haven, fils aîné de l'empereur et prince héritier temporairement privé de son autorité, pensant que celui-ci refusera et lui versera en échange une compensation financière. Mais contre toute attente, le Duc accepte de l'épouser. Il lui promet de lui fournir les matériaux nécessaires à la reconstruction de Pervaz si Asha l'aide à récupérer le trône qui lui revient de droit.
description.id: Setelah kematian ayah dan kakak-kakaknya melawan suku barbar, Asha Pervaz turun tangan untuk menggantikan mereka. Kemenangan berhasil ia raih, namun imbalan yang ia terima hanya cemoohan rakyat dan “hak memilih calon suami”, alih-alih hadiah uang untuk membangun kembali wilayahnya. Sadar bahwa Kaisar mempermainkannya, Asha memilih Carlisle Haven Evaristo, sang putra mahkota kekaisaran yang dicabut haknya akibat skandal besar, untuk menjadi suaminya! Asha yakin Carlisle akan menolaknya, namun…
description.ko: 28년간의 전쟁을 승리로 이끈 페르바즈의 영주, '아샤 페르바즈'. 긴 전쟁으로 황폐해진 페르바즈를 위해 아샤는 황제가 약속한 승전 보상을 받으러 황실로 향한다.   하지만 돌아온 보상은 고작 <결혼 상대 선택권>.  최선의 선택으로 얼마 전 황태자 위를 박탈당한 1황자, '칼라일 헤이븐 공작'을 지목한 아샤. 거절하면 황제에게 위자료를 지급받을 생각이었으나…  "페르바즈 변경백. 그대의 청혼을 받아들이겠다."  예상과 다르게 칼라일 공작은 아샤의 선택을 받아들였다. 페르바즈에 대한 엄청난 지원까지 약속하면서…!
description.th: อาชา เปอร์เวซ ลอร์ดแห่งเปอร์เวซ ผู้นำชัยชยะมาสู่สงครามที่กินเวลายาวนานกว่า 28 ปี อาชามุ่งหน้าไปยังพระราชวังเพื่อรับรางวัลแห่งชัยชนะที่จักรพรรดิได้ให้คำมั่นไว้ โดยมีจุดมุ่งหมายเพื่อนำมาบูรณะดินแดนเปอร์เวซ ซึ่งถูกจักรวรรดิทอดทิ้งจากสงครามที่ยืดเยื้อ แต่ทว่า รางวัลเดียวที่อาชาได้รับกลับเป็น <การเลือกคู่แต่งงาน> อาชาตัดสินใจเลือกมกุฎราชกุมาร ดยุกแห่งคาร์ไลล์ ฮาเว่น ผู้ซึ่งถูกปลดจากตำแหน่งมกุฎราชกุมารเมื่อไม่นานมานี้ ถ้าเธอถูกปฏิเสธ เธอก็จะได้รับรางวัลอย่างงามจากจักรพรรดิ แต่ว่า… “มาร์คกราฟแห่งเปอร์เวซ ข้ายอมรับคำขอแต่งงานของเจ้า” ทุกอย่างกลับไม่เป็นไปตามที่คาดไว้ ดยุกแห่งคาร์ไลล์ ฮาเว่นเลือกที่ยอมรับคำขอแต่งงานของอาชา และเขายังสัญญาที่จะให้การสนับสนุนเปอร์เวซอย่างเต็มที่อีกด้วย
description.tr: Perbaz’ın 28 yıl süren savaşı zafere taşıyan lordu ‘Asya Pervaz’. Uzun süren savaşta harap olan Pervaz için Asya, imparator tarafından vaat edilen zafer ödülünü almak üzere imparatorluk ailesine gider. Ancak kendisine geri dönen tek ödül <Evlilik eşi seçme hakkı> olmuştur. Asya en iyi seçenek olarak, yakın zamanda veliaht prens ünvanından mahrum bırakılan ilk prens olan ‘Colail Haven Dükü’nü işaret etti. Eğer reddedilirse, imparatordan nafaka almaya niyetliydi… “Markiz Pervaz. Evlilik teklifinizi kabul ediyorum.” Beklentilerin aksine Colail Dükü, Asya’nın teklifini kabul etti. Pervaz’a büyük destek sözü verdi!..
description.vi: Lãnh địa Pervaz đã bị tàn phá bởi một cuộc chiến tranh. Và vĩ lãnh chúa mới của lãnh địa Pervaz này chính là Asha Pervaz. Cô được hoàng đế ban thưởng cho chiến thắng của mình. Nhưng người gặp cô lại chế giễu cô là ‘nàng công chúa man rợ’ và thật là một đề nghị vô lý khi trao quyền chọn bạn đời làm phần thưởng cho chiến thắng. Asha phải đưa ra lựa chọn tốt nhất ngay cả trong hoàn cảnh này. “Vậy…công tước Carlyle Haven đi” Cô chọn ra đại hoàng tử, người đứng đầu danh sách quý tộc và cách đây không lâu đã gây ra một vụ bê bối lớn và bị tước đoạt danh hiệu đại hoàng tử. Nếu anh ta tức giận và từ chối, cô sẽ nhanh chóng đòi bồi thường sau đó, nhưng đâu ngờ rằng Carlyle lại chấp nhận sự lựa chọn của cô. “Anh mong muốn gì ở tôi?” “Đừng bận tậm đến việc tôi làm ở Pervaz. Đừng mong rằng được đối xử như một người vợ và cũng đừng nghĩ đến việc dính líu đến phe đối lập của tôi. Và khi tôi yêu cầu thì đừng nói linh tinh gì cả, chỉ cần ký vào tờ giấy ly hôn là được” Đó là một giao dịch không có gì là không tốt đối với Asha. Cô nắm lấy tay của kẻ ngạo mạn kia mà ngay cả hoàng đế cũng coi thường. Một nụ cười đầy sức quyến rũ nở trên môi anh. “Phu nhân, sau này xin được giúp đỡ”
description.zh:
事业型男女主被迫联姻，
强强联合收获爱与权力
在长达28年的战争中，佩尔瓦兹的领主“阿西娅·佩尔瓦兹”成功地率领众人取得了胜利。为了重建因长期战争而荒芜的佩尔瓦兹，阿西娅前往皇室领取皇帝承诺的胜仗奖励。但等待她却只是区区<择偶权>，而无任何实质性的奖励。想到佩尔瓦兹的百姓连今年冬天都可能撑不过去，阿西娅只好选择刚失去皇太子身份的卡莱尔公爵作为结婚对象…“既然皇室不想让我们好过，那么就拉你们一起下水”。
description.pt-br: Depois de vencer uma longa guerra, Asha Pervaz esperava que o imperador a compensasse com dinheiro. Ao contrário de suas expectativas, o imperador ordenou que Asha escolhesse um marido dentre uma lista de nobres. Ela escolheu o Duque Carlisle Haven, filho mais velho do imperador e antigo príncipe herdeiro. Asha esperava que ele fosse contra isso e, ao invés, pagasse uma pensão para ela , mas o Duque concordou em se casar com ela! Ele até prometeu ajudar a reconstruir Pervaz. O que o Duque realmente quer?  E Asha vai conseguir o que quer sem se envolver na crescente conspiração real?
description.zh-hk: 為了拯救因漫長戰爭而荒廢的領地「菲爾巴茲」，亞莎前往皇室向皇帝要求當初所承諾的戰勝補償。然而，她卻只獲得了「結婚對象選擇權」。權衡之下，亞莎認為最好的人選是不久前被剝奪皇太子地位的卡拉爾．海本公爵，假如被拒絕了，就能從皇帝那裡得到精神賠償… 「菲爾巴茲伯爵，我接受妳的求婚。」 出乎意料的是，卡拉爾公爵接受了亞莎的選擇，還承諾提供菲爾巴茲龐大的支援…！

description.en:
Witches suddenly declare war against humans, causing two-thirds of the world to fall apart. They summon monsters called "Supporters" and devastate human residences… but why?

Survivors gather people with the power to combat the witches and called them Witch Hunters! Tasha Godspell is one of the strongest nicknamed "The Marksman" along with his "Jack-O-Lantern" looking Supporter. He fights the witches but cannot really bring himself to hate them…

---

**Note:**  
*There are no missing chapters between 93 and 119. There is a difference in chapter numbering between the volume and magazine chapters which caused the gap.*
description.pl:
Wiedźmy wypowiadają wojnę ludziom. Przyzywają potwory i niszczą ludzkie rezydencje.  
 Pozostali przy życiu szukają chętnych do walki z nimi i nazywają ich Łowcami Wiedźm. Tasha Godspell, o przydomku Strzelec Wyborowy jest jednym z najlepszych. Zwalcza wiedźmy, ale nie może się zdobyć na nienawiść do nich.  
 Black Cat - 8 września 2010
description.pt-br: As bruxas declararam guerra contra os humanos, e dois terços do mundo desmoronou. Elas invocam monstros chamados de defensores. E devastam residências humanas... Mas por que? Os sobreviventes reuniram pessoas com o poder para combater as bruxas, esses são chamados de Witch Hunters(Caçadores de Bruxas)! Tasha Godspell é um dos mais fortes apelidado de "Atirador Mágico", juntamente com o seu defensor com a aparência do "Jack Lanterna Cabeça de Abóbora". Ele luta contra as bruxas, mas não pode realmente odiá-las...

altTitles.ja: フェイト／アポクリファ

description.en:
The setting of Fate/Apocrypha is a parallel world to Fate/stay night where the Greater Grail was removed from Fuyuki after the Third Holy Grail War and disappeared for many years. Around the 2000s, around the same time as the Fifth Holy Grail War would have happened, the group that plundered the Grail, Yggdmillennia, openly declares their secession from the Mage's Association and that they are in possession of the Grail. The Association dispatches fifty magi to retrieve it, but all but one are instantly slaughtered by Lancer of Black. The one remaining manages to activate the reserve system of the Greater Grail, allowing for the summoning of fourteen Servants in total.  
  
This marks the start of the Great Holy Grail War in Trifas, featuring two different factions, the Black Faction, whose members are part of Yggdramillennia, and the Red Faction, whose members were sent by the Mage's Association with the exception of one from the Church. The Grail itself also summons Ruler to act as a mediator of the Holy Grail War.
description.ru: События Fate/Apocrypha происходят в мире параллельном миру Fate/stay night, в котором Грааль был убран из города Фуюки после Третьей Войны. История начинается с того, что в Румынии был обнаружен «726-ой Святой Грааль». Его похитила и привезла в Румынию семья Иггдмилленния. Это знаменует начало Великой Войны Святого Грааля в городе Трифас с двумя противоборствующими сторонами: Чёрная Фракция, члены которой являются частью семьи Иггдмилленния и Красная Фракция, члены которой были посланы Ассоциацией Магов, за исключением одного участника от Церкви. Грааль также призывает Рулера выступать в качестве посредника в Войне Святого Грааля.
description.vi:
Nội dung của Fate/Apocrypha vẫn xoay quanh Cuộc Chiến Chén Thánh tại thành phố Fuyuki nhưng diễn ra trong một thế giới song song với thế giới của Fate/Stay Night. Tại đây, sau Cuộc Chiến Chén Thánh lần thứ 3, Đại Chén Thánh của thành phố Fuyuki đã đột ngột biến mất một cách bí ẩn.

Rất lâu sau đó, vào thời điểm những năm 2000, một gia tộc mang tên gọi Yggdmilennia đã công khai việc đánh cắp Chén Thánh của họ đồng thời tách rời khỏi Hiệp Hội Pháp Sư. Để đoạt lại Chén Thánh, Hiệp Hội Pháp Sư đã cử đi 50 thành viên tinh nhuệ nhất của mình nhưng tất cả đều bị Servant Lancer của nhà Yggdmilennia tiêu diệt. Tuy nhiên, người sống sót cuối cùng trong 50 pháp sư đã kịp kích hoạt cơ chế dự phòng của Đại Chén Thánh, được sử dụng nhằm ngăn chặn sự hợp tác giữa các Servant bằng cách cho phép 7 Master và 7 Servant mới được tham gia vào trận chiến. Từ đó mở màn cho cuộc Đại Chiến Chén Thánh với 14 Master cùng 14 Servant tại thành phố Trifas giữa Hắc Trận Doanh – những thành viên của gia tộc Yggdmilennia và Xích Trận Doanh – những Master đại diện cho Hiệp Hội Pháp Sư.

title.en: The Dentist Won't Stop Teasing Me

description.en: After suffering from an unbearable pain caused by a wisdom tooth, Cai Tong'an visits the dentist, only to be greeted with a beautiful and gentle Dr. Xie Ruanqing. To her surprise, she turns out to be the senior she secretly admired during her university days...

She's a second-year high school student with a single all-consuming question: Will the boy she likes ever really notice her? He's the school's most notorious juvenile delinquent and he's suddenly come to a shocking realization: He's got a huge crush, and now he must tell her how he feels.  
  
Chapter 232 does not exist, there's no chapters missing.  
  
Special Chapters:  
  
bb1 What's up Doc (February 9, 2010)  
Diamonds on the Inside (November 30, 2016)  
Give it Away (March 15, 2017)  
Hello Again (November 8, 2017)
description.pt-br:
Ela é uma estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio com uma única pergunta que a consome: será que o garoto de quem ela gosta realmente a notará? Ele é o delinquente juvenil mais notório da escola e de repente chega a uma conclusão chocante: ele tem uma paixão enorme e agora deve contar a ela como se sente.

O capítulo 232 não existe, não falta nenhum capítulo.

Capítulos Especiais:

bb1 E aí, doutor (9 de fevereiro de 2010)
Diamantes por dentro (30 de novembro de 2016)
Como percebeu (15 de março de 2017)
Olá de novo (8 de novembro de 2017)

The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
description.ja: ウルフカットで一匹狼なクール系女子の尊い片想い！
description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!

title.en: Crows Gaiden Housenka - the beginning of HOUSEN

altTitles.ja: クローズ外伝鳳仙花 ―the beginning of HOUSEN

altTitles.ja-ro: Crows Gaiden Housenka: the beginning of HOUSEN

altTitles.vi: Ngoại truyện Crows Housenka: Sự khởi đầu của HOUSEN

description.en: Before Narumi Taiga, Bitou Tatsuya, King Joe and Tsukimoto Mitsumasa, there was Terakado Butta. This is the story of how, under his leadership, Housen became the powerhouse that would become Suzuran High School's greatest opponent. Butta was there the year the school was founded, and without him, we would have never had the Housen Hitman we know and fear today.

title.en: How I Attended an All-Guy's Mixer

altTitles.ja: 合コンに行ったら女がいなかった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Goukon ni Ittara Onna ga Inakatta Hanashi

altTitles.zh: 到了聯誼會上發現連一個女生都沒有

altTitles.pt-br: Como Eu Fui a um Encontro Só de Homens

description.en: Tokiwa, a university student, is invited to a three-on-three blind date by Suou, a fellow classmate. On the day of the mixer, he goes to the pub where they are supposed to meet, only to find a group of handsome men waiting for him...
description.pt-br: Tokiwa, um estudante universitário, é convidado para um encontro às cegas de três contra três por Suou, um colega de classe. No dia do encontro, ele vai ao pub onde deveriam se encontrar, apenas para encontrar um grupo de homens bonitos esperando por ele...

altTitles.ja: ギルティサークル

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

title.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!

altTitles.en: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!

altTitles.ru: Да будет благословенен этот прекрасный мир!

altTitles.th: ขอให้โชคดีมีชัยในโลกแฟนตาซี

altTitles.ja: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！

altTitles.zh: 为美好的世界献上祝福！

description.en: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
description.es:
Kazuma Sato es un hikikomori que disfruta como un bellaco con los videojuegos, el manga y el anime. Un día decide salir de su casa, sufre un desafortunado accidente y fallece. Cuál es su sorpresa al ver que aparece en un limbo junto a una diosa llamada Aqua que le ofrece enviarlo a un nuevo mundo con tintes roleros y -además- concederle un deseo. Pero antes, Aqua se ocupa de humillarlo porque la muerte que él pensaba que había sido heroica salvando a una chica de ser atropellada, resulta ser lo más patética y cutre que te puedas echar a la cara. Lo único que se le ocurre al bueno de Kazuma es usar su deseo para que Aqua lo acompañe al nuevo mundo y se una a él en sus peripecias para derrotar al Rey Demonio.

En su nueva aventura encontrará una gran variedad de personajes a cada cual más cazurro, formando equipo con la pesada de Aqua, con Megumin, una maga loca por las explosiones y con Darkness, una paladín aficionada al sadomasoquismo. Viendo que su equipo está mal de la cabeza y que todas son más tontas que un zapato, Kazuma decide disfrutar de su nueva vida a lo grande, pero al final se las tendrá que ver con los generales del Rey Demonio que se cruzarán en su camino… y con sapos, un montón de babosos batracios.
description.ru: Кадзума Сато - хиккикомори, закоренелый фанат игр, аниме и манги. В какой-то момент, в попытке спасти человека он попадает в дорожную катастрофу и его жизнь обрывается. Казалось бы жизнь закончилась? Но Кадзума просыпается и видит перед собой красавицу, которая называет себя богиней. Она спрашивает, хочет ли он отправиться в другой мир? С условием, что он может взять с собой только одну вещь. Кадзума сразу же желает взять с собой богиню. Так и начинается его невероятное приключение против короля демонов, но перед этим нужно заняться другими делами. Например, найти пищу, одежду и убежище. Кадзума хочет жить в мире и спокойствия, но богиня находит одну проблему за другой. А кроме того, армия демонов имеет какие-то свои виды на него.
description.pt-br: A vida de Satou Kazuma, um hikikomori que gosta de jogos, muito em breve chegou ao fim por causa de um acidente de trânsito... Deveria ser, mas quando ele acorda, uma linda deusa aparece diante de seus olhos. "Ei, eu tenho algo um pouco agradável para você. Quer ir para outro mundo? Você pode desejar apenas uma coisa de sua escolha junto com você." "Então eu irei levá-la." Daqui em diante, a grande aventura de subjugar o Rei Demônio começará para Kazuma reencarnado, ou assim se poderia pensar, mas é o trabalho para a obter alimentos, roupas e abrigo começa! Apesar de Kazuma querer viver em paz, a deusa acaba causando problemas, um após outro, e eventualmente, eles atraem a atenção do exército do Rei Demônio.

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター
HUNTER×HUNTER カラー版

altTitles.en: Hunter x Hunter - Digital Colored Comics

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.vi: Truyện dõi theo hành trình của bốn nhân vật chính: Gon, Killua, Kurapika và Leorio.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Hunter x Hunter". Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.

altTitles.ja: ナナとカオル ブラックレーベル
ナナとカオル (嵐)
ナナとカオル　Black Label

description.en:
This Arashi series begins 8 months in the future of YA, with Nana and Kaoru in the summer of their final year of high school.  
  
This series uses a different support cast & a different location setting than the original serialization, and as such it doesn't really spoil anything from the main series.

altTitles.ja: 桃源暗鬼

altTitles.en: Tougen Anki: Legend of the Cursed Blood

altTitles.fr: Tôgen Anki : La légende du sang maudit

description.en: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!
description.fr:
Une légende raconte qu'un enfant extrêmement fort serait né d'une pêche et baptisé Momotarô. Lorsqu'il devint assez grand et puissant, ce valeureux guerrier aurait chassé les Oni qui pillaient les villages. Ce héros n'est pas une légende... Tout comme les Oni...
Leurs descendants sont encore parmi nous et la bataille opposait le clan Momotarô au clan des Oni fait rage ! Shiki est un jeune garçon, au sang chaud. Alors qu'il vient de se faire renvoyer de l'école, il prend conscience qu'il possède du sang de Oni. Le clan Momotarô le cherche et veut l'éliminer. la quête de liberté de Shiki et des autres Oni commence...
description.ja: 「お前は鬼の血を継いでいる……」　主人公・四季は自らの血に棲む者と出逢うことになる。
description.pt-br: Ichinose Shiki, um herdeiro do sangue de Oni, viveu toda a sua infância alheio a esse fato. No entanto, quando um homem desconhecido entra correndo em sua casa na tentativa de assassiná-lo, seu pai adotivo finalmente revela a verdade. Em um mundo onde Oni e Momotarou nunca puderam coexistir, junte-se a Ichinose em sua luta pelo poder e unificando as duas raças!

altTitles.ja: 恋する鬼畜島

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Đường Ở Đảo Quái Dị

description.en: Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?

altTitles.ja: 菜々子さん的な日常RE

description.en: The adventures of Nanako continues.

altTitles.ja: 少女・ザ・ワイルズ

description.en:
Wilds high, it has a history of 42 years as a fighting specialist all girls private highschool meant solely for the elite. The place Wilds-League is held, the most popular event in the country, the only place in the world where teenage girls have brutal fights with their lives.  
This year has been changed into a mixed gender school. The only male student- Song Jae Gu, has been granted a full 3-year scholarship regardless of grades. Being someone who had to spend every moment working or taking care of his two younger brothers, he accepted.  
However, the scholarship was granted with the sole condition he does not leave. But after meeting Queen, the bloody champion of Wild's-League, drenching her in coffee, calling her a "Monster" and getting caught while she was taking a shower… that could prove fatal.  
  
By the artist of Pet Diary and Nineteen Twenty One, Zhena (Kim Hye-jin), and the writer, HUN.
description.pt-br: O Colégio Wilds, tem uma história de 42 anos como especialista em combate, todas as meninas do colégio privado destina-se exclusivamente para a elite. A Wilds-League é o evento mais popular do país, o único lugar no mundo onde as meninas têm lutas brutais. Este ano foi transformado em uma escola mista. O único estudante homem, Song-Jae Gu, foi concedido uma bolsa de estudos de 3 anos, independentemente de suas notas. Sendo uma pessoa que precisa trabalhar ou cuidar de seus dois irmãos mais novos, ele acabou aceitando a proposta. No entanto, a bolsa foi concedida com uma única condição, de não sair. Mas depois de conhecer a rainha sangrenta do último torneio e lhe derrubar café, vê-la tomando banho… Seus dias podem estar contados.

altTitles.ja: フェイト/エクストラ CCC FoxTail
フェイト/エクストラ CCC フォックステイル

description.en:
Being flung from the world of Fate/Extra Kishinami Hakuno finds himself in a very strange predicament. Caster Route.  
  
Note: There are no missing chapters. Chapter #32-33 are missing due to a difference in the volume and magazine numbering. Some earlier small chapters were combined in the volumes causing the number difference. Chapter 34 directly follows Chapter 31.
description.pt-br: Sendo expulso do mundo de Fate/Extra Kshinami Hakuno se encontra em uma situação muito estranha. Rota Caster.

title.en: Lalalab☆ ~Gal to Kagaku to Seishun to!~

altTitles.ja: ラララボ☆ ～ギャルと科学と青春と！～

altTitles.en: Lala Lab ⭐︎ Gyaru, Science, and Youth!

description.en: Lala Mizusawa might look like a flashy gyaru and act high-energy, but don’t be fooled—she’s a hardcore science geek and a third-year biology major with dreams of becoming a great scientist! While her lofty goal sometimes shakes her confidence, she’s got her quirky labmates to keep her going: the refined and otaku-spirited Hanako Naito, and the lazy pajama-wearing Toki Busujima. Together, they celebrate the thrill of growing microbes, steam sweet potatoes in the autoclave, and dive headfirst into their delightfully chaotic campus life (if you can call it that)! ☆
description.ja: 水沢ララは、ギャルい見た目とハイテンションで誤解されがちだけど、“偉大な科学者”を目指すガチ理系の大学3年生(理学部生物学科)！大きすぎる目標に自信喪失する日もあるけど、オタク気質のお嬢様・内藤花恋、パジャマ登校のずぼらっ子・毒島ときという個性豊かな研究室仲間と、菌が増えて喜んだり、高圧蒸気滅菌器で芋を蒸かしたり…キャンパスライフ（？）だって満喫中☆

altTitles.ja: 王様ランキング

description.en:
The web manga centers around Bojji, a deaf, powerless prince who cannot even wield a children's sword. As the firstborn son, he strives hard and dreams of becoming the world's greatest king. However, people mutter about him behind his back as "a good-for-nothing prince" and "no way he can be king."  
  
Bojji is able to make his first ever friend, "Kage" — a literal shadow on the ground who somehow understands Bojji well. The story follows Bojji's coming-of-age as he meets various people in his life, starting with his fateful encounter with Kage.
description.es:
Bojji es un príncipe sordomudo que vive en un mundo fantástico repleto de criaturas mágicas. Pese a no destacar en nada, y siendo incapaz ni siquiera de empuñar una espadita de niño, sueña con algún día convertirse en el rey más grande del mundo.

La gente lo considera un completo inútil y sin ningún talento para ser rey. Aunque la situación cambia cuando conoce a Kage, una sombra (literalmente) que es uno de los pocos supervivientes de un clan de asesinos y que intenta robarle las pocas pertenencias que Bojji llevaba encima.

De alguna manera, Kage logra comprender al príncipe y se convierte en su primer amigo verdadero, dando así inicio a la aventura que Bojji tanto anhela. Mientras tanto, en la oscuridad, un poder amenaza con devastar al reino.
description.ru: Боддзи удаётся найти своего первого в жизни друга, «Кагэ» — буквально тень на земле, которая каким-то образом хорошо понимает Боддзи. История рассказывает о взрослении Боддзи, о том, как он встречает разных людей в своей жизни, начиная с судьбоносной встречи с Кагэ.
description.vi:
"Bảng xếp hạng Quốc vương" xoay quanh Bojji, một hoàng tử điếc, vô năng, và thậm chí không thể cầm nổi thanh kiếm của một đứa con nít. Là con cả, cậu luôn cố gắng hết mình để tiến tới ước mơ trở thành vị vua vĩ đại nhất thế giới. Thế nhưng, luôn có những kẻ buông lời xì xào bàn tán sau lưng Bojji, bảo cậu là "một thằng hoàng tử bất tài", và "không đời nào có thể trở thành vua được". 

Bojji đã có người bạn đầu tiên của mình, "Kage", một bóng đen trên mặt đất, bằng cách nào đó lại có thể hiểu rõ về cậu. Đây là câu chuyện kể về sự trưởng thành của Bojji khi cậu gặp được những người khác nhau trong cuộc đời mình, bắt đầu từ lần gặp gỡ định mệnh của cậu với Kage.
description.pt-br:
O mangá da web comic gira em torno de Bojji, um príncipe surdo e impotente que não consegue nem empunhar uma espada infantil. Como filho primogênito, ele se esforça muito e sonha em se tornar o maior rei do mundo. No entanto, as pessoas murmuram sobre ele pelas costas como 'um príncipe inútil' e 'de jeito nenhum ele pode ser rei'.

Bojji é capaz de fazer seu primeiro amigo, 'Kage' - literalmente um ser vivo que é uma sombra no chão que de alguma forma entende Bojji bem. A história segue o amadurecimento de Bojji enquanto ele conhece várias pessoas em sua vida, começando com seu fatídico encontro com Kage.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 12, Cap 155. ]

title.en: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything

altTitles.en: I Don't Want To Do Anything

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)
description.ko:
26살의 봄, 오늘부터 아무것도 하지 않기로 결심했다

엄마가 그랬다. 
손해 보고 사는 게 편하다고.

엄마 말이 맞다.
그래, 손해 보고 살자.

단, 호구 잡히지 않을 정도만.

이여름, 26세 봄
오늘 회사를 그만뒀다.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.ru: Пробравшись на невольничий корабль, Юлиан отправляется на континент вместе с сотней рабов, жаждущих свободы... Но что ждёт его впереди?!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

altTitles.ja: テムパル〜アイテムの力〜

description.de:
Shin Youngwoo spielt mit seinem Avatar "Grid" das zurzeit beliebteste Virtual-Reality-Spiel der Welt: Satisfy.  
  
Ob in der Realität oder in-game, Shin scheint vom Unglück verfolgt zu werden. Doch als er nach der Suche nach einem Questgegenstand seine Belohnung erhält, kann er zu einer legendären Klasse wechseln. Einer Klasse, die außer ihm niemand der über 2 Milliarden Spielern besitzt.
description.en:
Shin Youngwoo (aka Grid), an unlucky man in life and a low-level player in the popular VR game Satisfy, finds a powerful item that earns him a rare legendary class title: Pagma’s Successor. Now a skilled blacksmith, he can forge unique weapons and equip the game’s most powerful gear!

Grid resolves to use his new abilities to achieve fame and fortune, but as his very existence begins to stir up trouble in Satisfy, he realizes that life as a legend may be more than he bargained for….
description.fa:
⁧⁧بزرگ‌ترین بازی واقعیت مجازی جهان «ستیسفای».  
⁧چه تو واقعیت و چه در دنیای مجازی شینگ وو کسی بود که همه‌ی بدبختی‌ها سرش می‌اومد.  
⁧اما تو میون این‌همه بدبختی‌، یه‌بار شانس بهش رو می‌کنه و تو یه مأموریت غیرممکن کتاب پاگما رو پیدا می‌کنه، کتابی افسانه‌ای که زندگی اون رو از این رو به اون رو می‌کنه.
description.fr:
Quand un joueur raté de VMMORPG tombe, lors d’une quête, sur un livre légendaire permettant de changer de classe, il en profite immédiatement. Attention joueurs, le plus grand de tous les forgerons est né ! Et il n‘a pas prévu de passer inaperçu !

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/overgeared)
description.id:
Shin Youngwoo punya kehidupan yang bernasib sial. Ia terpaksa bekerja kasar di sebuah tempat kontruksi untuk membayar biaya sekolah dan uang game yang ia gunakan. Bahkan ia juga kerja kasar di VR Game yang bernama Satisfy. Namun, hidupnya mulai berubah ketika karakternya sebagai 'Grid' di game menemukan 'Pagma's Rare Book' hingga menjadi legendary class player.

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Kekuatan-Item/3406)
description.ja:
世界最高のバーチャルリアリティゲーム<SATISFY>。 全世界ユーザー数２０億人、もう一つの地球と呼ばれるほどの壮大なファンタジーゲーム。 しがない無職のゲーム中毒者である「長嶺巧」はゲーム課金の借金を返すために日雇い労働をする以外のほとんどの時間はゲームに費やしていた。 ある日、クエスト中にレジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞を手に入れた「巧」。 ＜ファグマの奇書＞売って大儲けできると思ったその瞬間…！新たなクエストが発動され殺される寸前になるが… このままだと殺され、レジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞もなくしてしまうと思った「巧」は＜ファグマの奇書＞を開き、伝説の職人＜ファグマの末裔＞へとジョブチェンジするが… 借金まみれの底辺人生から２０億プレイヤーの頂点に立つレジェンダリープレイヤーになれるのか！？

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/43170)
description.ko:
[신영우 (유저 네임: 그리드)]
세계 최고의 가상 현실 게임 <SATISFY>.

현실에서나, 게임 속에서나, 불운은 항상 그의 곁을 맴도는데....
퀘스트 수행 중 우연히 발견한 게임 속 로또, '파그마의 기서'. 
20억 명이 넘는 유저 중 유일한 최강의 레전드리 직업으로 전직.

"어떻게 아직 살아있는 거지...?!"

"뭐, 특별한 건 없고..."


"템빨이죠."

지긋지긋한 불운과 악몽 같은 빚쟁이 인생에서 벗어난
최강 플레이어 "그리드".
고인물도 울고 갈 끝판왕이 찾아온다!

[<SATISFY>에 접속합니다.]

웹툰 <템빨>은 매주 토요일 연재됩니다.
description.ru: В реальности, в играх, где бы он ни был, ему сопутствуют неудачи... Но в один момент всё меняется. В игре конце Северной пещеры он обнаружит квест, в котором найдёт "Редкую книгу Пагмы"... Ему удастся то, что не удалось сотням миллионов пользователей. - Как ты выжил? - Ничего особенного.
description.th:
ชินยองอู ID กริด ไม่ว่าจะในชีวิตจริงหรือในในโลกเกมเสมือนจริง SATISFY เขาก็เป็นตัวแทนแห่งความอับโชคไม่ต่างกัน...
แต่อยู่มาวันหนึ่ง กริด ได้พบกับตำราเปลี่ยนอาชีพที่นำเขาไปสู่การเปลี่ยนเป็นอาชีพระดับตำนาน 'ทายาทของแพ็กม่า'
อาชีพช่างตีเหล็กในตำนานที่จะทำให้เขาหลุดพ้นจากหนี้สิน พร้อมกับได้สัมผัส 'พลังแห่งไอเทม' และก้าวสู่การเป็นผู้เล่นที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุด!

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Overgeared/43)
description.zh:
无论是现实世界还是游戏世界中，他都是最底层的存在！然而咸鱼翻身的机会终于来了！只要能够找到游戏中的最强装备，就能获得超20亿玩家中唯一一个成为传说中最强职业电竞选手的机会！他能否在假想现实游戏世界中创造新的传奇，成功脱离如同噩梦般的悲惨人生呢？

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28630)
description.zh-hk:
[申英宇(使用者名稱：格里德)]
稱霸全球的虛擬實境遊戲《SATISFY》

無論現實還是遊戲中，他都是個「不幸」的象徵...
在解任務時偶然發現
遊戲中的樂透——「帕格瑪的奇書」，
並轉職成20億玩家中，僅只一名的最強傳奇級職業。

「你怎麼還活著...?!」

「嗯...也沒什麼啦...」

「靠裝備囉。」

脫離不幸與惡夢般的債務，
重生為最強玩家的「格里德」!
經典名著通通滾開，真正的王者駕到了!

[已成功登入《SATISFY》。]

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%A3%9D%E5%82%99%E4%BB%94/47)

altTitles.en: This Older Woman Is a Fiction!?

altTitles.ja: このお姉さんはフィクションです!?

description.en: Late one night when Jun was out on his bike, he came across a drunk, half-naked girl sprawled on the side of the road. She came to be uncomfortably affectionate, but Jun took her to his home to sleep it off with gentlemanly discretion. It turns out that she is Kawase Narumi, his author mother's new assistant. Unfortunately, she has no idea what she's doing in her new job, so Jun's going to have to coach her. He's also going to have to deal with her habit of getting drunk, mostly naked, and cuddly. Jun's life will never be the same!

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

altTitles.es-la: El día que decidí hacer entender a mi descarada hermana gal a mi manera

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?
